author: gregthegreek
content:
How receptive would EL teams be to a un-scheduled HF that would be a low diff way "alternative delegation" to 7702? I'm trying to better guage how the AA teams need to be thinking about internal R&D work. You can think of them as AA_TYPE(s) akin to a TX_TYPE... 

I say unplanned, because the its one of those things that would move the needle so aggressively forward on UX - its hard to justify "8 months out", especially if its a low lift.

author: tersec
content: what's this "unscheduled" thing? just try to get this CFI'd for Fusaka, or not

author: gregthegreek
content: Something akin to how we would roll out difficulty bomb adjustments.

author: gregthegreek
content: Fusaka is realistically like ~8 months out? I understand EVM complexity issues, but we need to still improve the UX layer we're not quite finished. 7702 was a stepping stone at best

content: Oh i know! I'm still sourcing the feedback on having these as hardforks lol. It's just 7702 delegations have this rough patch where they kinda have a genericness that can be extended, similar to ERC-1193.. But everytime we need to do that we need a HF..
